entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Three Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM MDT Wednesday 04 May 2016
